original_title: Carmen Electra's Aerobic Striptease, Vol 6 - In the Bedroom
overview: Carmen’s back and bringing total body fitness to the sexiest room in the house in Carmen Electra’s Aerobic Striptease: In the Bedroom. A follow-up to her top selling fitness series, In the Bedroom combines body-sculpting dance moves with sultry stretches and toning exercises you can perform on or around your own bed.
title: Carmen Electra's Aerobic Striptease, Vol 6 - In the Bedroom
